title: 2018–19 Southern Illinois Salukis women's basketball team
text:
The 2018–19 Southern Illinois women's basketball team represents <a href="Southern%20Illinois%20University%20Carbondale">Southern Illinois University Carbondale</a> during the <a href="2018%E2%80%9319%20NCAA%20Division%20I%20women%27s%20basketball%20season">2018–19 NCAA Division I women's basketball season</a>. The Salukis were led by sixth year head coach <a href="Cindy%20Stein">Cindy Stein</a>. They play their home games at <a href="SIU%20Arena">SIU Arena</a> and were members of the <a href="Missouri%20Valley%20Conference">Missouri Valley Conference</a>. They finished the season 15–15, 8–10 in MVC play to finish in sixth place. They lost in the quarterfinals of the <a href="2019%20Missouri%20Valley%20Conference%20Women%27s%20Basketball%20Tournament">Missouri Valley Women's Tournament</a> to Northern Iowa.
